Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/ Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark due to, event traffic at Clark/ Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark, due to event traffic at Clark/ Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier minor fire at track level at Montrose. Service resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier minor fire at track level at Montrose.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
